page.title: 11TRANSPORT.TRAFFIC IN COWFOLD
page.content: Cowfold is situated at the junction of A272, East/West and A281,North/South. Cowfold is a busy village because A272 is one of the few cross country routes East/West, south of London.It is quite dangerous for pedestrians to cross the roads.It would be safer if there were a pelican or zebra crossing.Massive articulated lorries have trouble going round the roundabouts. Lorries are a hazard to Cowfold.They drive over the kerbs and pedestrians cannot be seen from the high cabs. Many people in Cowfold think that some thing ought to be done about the traffic:building a bypass is a popular suggestion. In a survey during 1 hour on one Summer Friday morning, nearly 1,000 cars passed through Cowfold and over 300 lorries and vans went through the village in the same period.
